Question: On June 29, 2012, it was announced that Holmes had filed for divorce from this person after five and a half years of marriage.
Hints: In 2006, this person sued cybersquatter Jeff Burgar to obtain control of the Tomthis person.com domain name.
This person replaced her with his sister, fellow Scientologist Lee Anne DeVette, who served in that role until November 2005.
In February 2001 this person filed for divorce from Kidman while she was unknowingly pregnant.
